clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Tetraethylammonium is an experimental drug with no approved indication

contraindications.disease: Studies in animals and humans have reported cases of serious muscle paralysis which can lead to respiratory distress and death
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Tetraethylammonium is a vasodilator because it blocks autonomic ganglia and prevents signals carrying vasoconstrictor impulses from proceeding

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Tetraethylammonium can be increased when it is combined with Risdiplam
